website_summaries.verdict: A great set of neoprene-coated dumbbells for light workouts at home.
pros: This set includes a small but functional rack and three pairs of neoprene-coated dumbbells weighing 3, 5, and 8 lbs
The neoprene is smooth and easy to grip
For those with space concerns, this little set is a great option
cons: Some customers had difficulty assembling the stand

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I’m 20 weeks pregnant and recently bought these weights as part of a prenatal Pilates routine. While using one of the weights, I felt a sharp object impale my finger. I looked down and found a thin needle sticking out of the weight that had come through the material and stabbed my hand. Needless to say, I will be writing a formal complaint as this caused me to bleed and caused a lot of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F.

customer_reviews.title: The foam ate through the finish on a side table ...
customer_reviews.text: The foam ate through the finish on a side table after just setting it down on it overnight. I picked it up the next morning and it had melted through the finish leaving a goopy mess. I read another review about the same thing happening and thought it was too weird to be true. What is this stuff that eats through finish? Probably shouldn't touch these. I'll be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved broke
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this purchase. The 2lb weights had nicks in the rubber and my 3lb weight was broken. How does a weight break?
customer_reviews.author: Karyla Conner

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have you heard of brand new dumbbells splitting in half? Well, here they are! The product arrived last Wednesday. My 17 year old did bicep curls only twice. One of them suddenly broke (photo) and fell on the floor with a thump. Thankfully, there was neither physical injury nor property damage. The material looks like some kind of compound, heavy but isn't like steel but more like coal. When a company like Amazon places their brand name on private label products, you'd think these products are thoroughly vetted. I'm really disappointed with Amazon. I hope they'll pull this product out.
customer_reviews.author: HEA

customer_reviews.title: A true collectors set!
customer_reviews.text: My GF bought these as collectors pieces, it been months and they remain in pristine condition sitting in unopened boxes in our pantry, along with a workout DVD still wrapped in the original plastic. Hopefully these will stay in the family for generations to come, at least the family who buys them from our future garage sale for 1/10th the price.
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: Middle of dumbell is way too thick compared to my other sizes.
customer_reviews.text: The middle of this dumbell is much THICKER than any other of my neoprene weights. I have 5, 8, 9, 12, 15 and now 20 pound dumbells. However, sadly these will not be used hardly at all because my hands do not fit comfortly around the handle. I am 5 feet tall and weigh 120. I do wish I could return these and invest in adjustable weights instead.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PLASTIC STAND
customer_reviews.text: One start for the weights, which is what I really needed. But I am very upset with the quality of the plastic screws and plastic stand. I tried to screw on in and it is not stuck. There is NO way for me to unscrew it. Many people have tried and it literally will not unscrew, but it's only screwed in HALF way. I really was expecting more from the "amazon basics" products but I will not be buying anything else under "Amazon basics". I am extremely disappointed, and this was a waste of my money. Just go to your local Walmart instead, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little hand weights
customer_reviews.text: Great little hand weights. But you must use the stand. I sadly made the mistake of laying them on my furniture and it ate the finish off of my wood dresser!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Inspect for sharp protruding metal
customer_reviews.text: Received this and used them to workout once. Next time I tried to pick them up, one of them cut my palm. After close inspection, found there was a sharp metal wire poking out from the neoprene coating. Was able to pull the wire out and will continue to use the dumbbells. However, this was still a very unpleasant experience which I wish you to avoid by either not purchasing these or inspecting thoroughly when you receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of weights for a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her workouts. I have to tell you I am amazed at the cost and quality of these weights. They came so well packaged. Everything was individually wrapped. The feel of the weight is perfect and has great grip. The dumbell holder was very easy to assemble, probably took less than 10mins. U only need a screwdriver. The holder holds the weight very well and looks pleasing. I am very happy with my purchase. Only thing i would like better is the plastic holder. It would be nice if it was a tad heavier and had grips on the bottom so it does not slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Joon yi

customer_reviews.title: Damaged & inaccurate weight!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with corners cracked despite being wrapped in bubble wrap and in boxes Inside of another box. Also too heavy, I injured myself and caused a migraine from neck pain it caused. Larger box said weight 21.5 lbs l. I’m used to lifting 10-20 lbs and this is not accurate
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Love

customer_reviews.title: Compact weight storage
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It is compact and is the perfect size for my studio apartment. It can be tucked away in a corner or under desk. It is colorful and bright. Weights are the exact weight It displays (according to my scale) This took 3 minutes to assemble and was very self explanatory. You will need a phillips screw driver to put the weight holder together.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Stains everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The coating stained my hands and manicure yellow after one short use. Very disappointed. I never imagined that a set of basic weights could do anything to get a low review. The yellow weights even stained the blue weights. I’m nervous to leave these anywhere now after reading the reviews about damage to the finish on wooden floors and shelves.
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: 20 lbs if you have Gorilla hands, 35 lbs otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, these are chunkers. I have been lifting weights for 3 years now; I am a 6'2" 165 lb male and my bench press is 200 and squat 275. I have decent hand strength and occasionally train forearms, however, these weights in the 20 lb option are unlike any dumbbell I have ever used. The diameter of the grip is twice what I am used to. I fit well in gloves size Medium and I have difficulty doing bicep curls because my hands start to give out. The girth on these weights is on another level. I kept them because I would like to improve my grip and forearm strength, but that was not my intended use case.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Beware of setting down on table or printed paper
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine but BEWARE — avoid putting down in a surface other than the stand that comes with it. I never imagined that it would release a sticky film on a wooden table I left one on. I also left one on a piece of paper with printing on it and it lifted the ink. After scrubbing, the print remained and my table has a big mark on it and the weight is stained from the wood. So, be careful! (See photo showing results after scrubbing with multiple cleaners.)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: COLOR STAINS
customer_reviews.text: THE COLOR IN THESE TRANSFERS. I saw reviews that stated this, but assumed those people were doing something weird with their weights. After using them for 2 months, the stand is covered in the colors of the weights, which is weird as the stand is black. The stand was near my couch... Now my couch is covered in stains. Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The colors look so dirty. The cheap plastic stand didnt even have enough screws. Just by touching the actual weights, i knew the neoprene will not last long at all. All of the weights even have little holes all around the handle. If it wasnt so much if a hassle to return, i would. I bought some neoprene weights at walmart in 2013 and the coating is still intact and i throw those suckers around.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix87

customer_reviews.title: Great for treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands and although these are small bells, they work fine and add a little extra to my treadmill workouts. I was using two rolls of quarters taped together on each hand for a 1 pound weight before these arrived and these are much easier on the hands. And they're less expensive, too! Adding these to your morning stretches make a positive difference, too.. These little weights make a big impact on your formerly 'weightless' stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Rory James

customer_reviews.title: rubber cover is loose and leaks unknown chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The pair of 5lbs dumbbell were left on top of a furniture overnight, and unknown chemicals seeped into the paint and permanently ruined the paint and furniture. See photos. This shows the chemical in the rubber is unstable. So a pair of gloves are needed when using them, in order not to get the chemicals on skins. In addition, the rubber cover feels loose - not tightly attached to the metal under the rubber cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bart G

customer_reviews.title: Be careful unpackaging this.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are accurate and like ones from Walmart. However, the colors are very dingy and dirty looking. Also the stand is cheap junk plastic. Went to put it together and a package of 10 screws spilled all over the floor as package was NOT sealed along top seam so could not put stand together so just threw it. A little more thought could go into the color selection and design of stand and packaging of screws. Weights are now sitting on carpet under coffee table. I was expecting a nice solid plastic stand or perhaps a metal stand as this could be fairly decorative and a reminder to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas O'shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: I have several heavier weights from Target which are much better quality. The grip shape is better, the coating is thick and tough and has stayed on for years of use. These will do because weights are still sold out most places (including Target) and I needed 3lbs weights for spinning classes. But these are not a quality item and I would not repurchase. The coating is uneven and very thin. I doubt it will last.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Plastic junk
customer_reviews.text: The weights are okay but the weight tree is a piece of plastic junk...Seriously!?
customer_reviews.author: acruz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home/gym use
customer_reviews.text: I have this product in 2 lb weights, but wanted my own set of 3 lb weights. This set has what I need and I can carry the weights I want to the gym. I like to use my own weights. The only problem for me was setting up the little stand. The screws were hard for me to screw into the predrilled holes. I understand it's necessary because it's plastic and you want everything to be secure. Once I assembled the stand it seemed pretty sturdy. I like the convenience of having my own weights at a good price. They arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Large handle
customer_reviews.text: I have "average" sized female hands. The handles on these dumbbells are so wide that it feels like you'd need to have the hands that someone who is 6'2" would have in order to make them comfortable to hold! They work fine... you just have less of a closed grip than you may be used to if your hands are similar in size to mine. Photos for reference - a green 8-lb dumbbell for scale (with a 'normal' sized grip)
customer_reviews.author: Thera Slayton

customer_reviews.title: 15lbs handle a bit too thick
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning for women or anyone else with hands on the smaller side--as you get to the 15lb size, the handle starts to be too big around to keep a firm hold on. I'd guess my hands are about average size for a woman and my thumb and fingers barely meet. I'm guessing they continue to add thickness to the handle part in the weights above this one, so I'll be switching to a different model of dumbbell next time I need to go up in weight. The quality is great, and the 12s are just right when it comes to the thickness of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cover is Cracking
customer_reviews.text: Checked the weight and both came out to 15.4 pounds. Close enough for my purposes. I like the thicker handles because they give me a better grip. I have medium size hands for a man. They may be too big for someone with especially small hands. Adding and update and knocking off three stars. I've used these twice a week for nine weeks and the neoprene cover is starting to crack and peel on one dumbbell. It's only happening to one of the pair so I'd say that's proof of a manufacturing defect. If it was the way I was using them, it would be happening to both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and basic neoprene dumbbells. I gave them a one start because they’re FILTHY. There are black dirt hand marks, fingerprints, etc all over the handles. That’s just gross especially during the pandemic. Neoprene isn’t easy to clean either so now I’m stuck trying to cup the neoprene off. Thanks amazon-
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: When I received my weights I opened the box and found I was missing 1 of the sides to put the stand together. I had all of the weights, all of the connectors, but only 1 of the 2 sides you need to build the stand. I decided not to send it back since the price was so low and all the weights were fine, but I was a bit disappointed that I didn’t have the stand to store them
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Waited 3 months for these to be available! Yippy!!
customer_reviews.text: The holder has to be assembled which is easy but it is flimsy and wobbles from being uneven. It holds the weights just fine so it serves its purpose and I’m happy. The weights are great quality and in perfect condition! I’m actually excited to tone up these jiggly arms! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Left stains on brand new, expensive couch. #Dead
customer_reviews.text: Ugh!!!! Brand new basement with brand new couch. Ordered this set (which I’ve been loving) and then one of my kiddos was sitting on our cream ottoman and using the weights while watching TV. 8lb dumbbells left yellow stains all over the couch! I want to cry.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and I want a refund !
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review when I first opened this box and noted there was damage to the weights but Amazon said the review wasn’t allowed... I bought this for my daughter and we’re very careful with our equipment and she loved them except now the damage is even larger! This weight is unusable and I suspect it’s twin will eventually do the same. If anyone on Amazon would like to send my child another set that would be lovely! This is highly disappointing and definitely was caused in manufacturing not by us.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights, but underweight .4-.8 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the 12 pound weights and they safely arrived, nice grip and finish, but both weigh in at 11.6 pounds on my accurate digital scale. Glad they match anyways. I'll keep and use them and upgrade to 15lbs soon enough :-) ADDITION: Just got a pair of the 15lb dumbells. They are nice but also unmatched and underweight...one is 14.2lbs and the other is 14.6lbs. Hey Amazon lean on your suppliers a bit to get closer to correct weight, kaythanks.
customer_reviews.author: Keru

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price. Grips might be too thick.
customer_reviews.text: I take hand weights on my hikes so I can get a better workout. I worked my way up from 5lbs to 8lbs, then 10lbs, 12lbs and finally these! They're easy to hold and definitely a good jump from 12lbs. I like the hexagon shape, it makes them easy to set down so they won't roll away, and also to put against each other for various exercises. My only gripe is that the handles are pretty thick. I make it work, but it's certainly thicker than the last set I had from Target. If I has smaller hands, it might be a bigger issue.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Richey

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job, looks great and the stand is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the midst of Covid. First things first. No price gauging by amazon. The deliver was quicker than expected. If you know how to use a screwdriver setting it up is no brainer. The weights themselves are solid, feels great and my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Quality dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: This dumbbells are great quality. They're sturdy, durable, and sustain my weight (120 lbs) very well when doing things like plank rows or push ups. They don't roll around because of the shape, which is great for stability and safety. Highly recommend ordering ahead, even if its "Temporarily Out of Stock". I got it a little quicker than initially quoted time. Update: The grips are actually not as great after multiple uses. They are wider than the rubber hex dumbbells, which I am used to. These grips are not super thick, but thick enough to make it uncomfortable after extended period of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived punctured
customer_reviews.text: This product is getting 2/5 stars because it’s damaged. If It wasn’t punctured I would have given it a 5/5. The reason why I am not returning it is because it’s too much effort. Due to Covid 19 it took forever to receive it. Obviously this Not anyone’s fault. Too much effort to pack it back ip, print a label and bring it to the post office and wait another month for a new set. Other than that it works like it’s it’s susposed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good set of weights
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The weight is pretty accurate. They are easy to use. The rack was easy to put together and sturdier than I expected. I'm giving 4 instead of five stars because the coating on several weights had identical puncture marks where it looks like it was set on a rack that punctured the coating (it did not come from the rack that came with it). I still think they'll hold up, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality. Clean up easy
customer_reviews.text: These are great dumbbells. Are they 12lbs? I swear these weigh more. 😂 I love these. I take them outside and workout when I run stairs and sometimes they get dirty. A little dawn in the kitchen sink and they look brand new. They clean up nice. Mine still look brand new and I use mine everyday and I got them 18 months ago. I do take good care of my belongings but I’m impressed with the durability of neoprene coating.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great gripping 20lb dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This set is a very nice little addition to a good lite workout it’s easy to put the black plastic dumbbell stand together you need a Phillips screwdriver that’s it the dumbbells fit in it a total of 20lbs two 5lbs on bottom reck there lime. Then 3lbs on top of them these are purple the last on top of them comes two 2lbs pink dumbbells my wife and I both use this set they feel good in your hands with the way there made just a great gripping touch definitely amazing little convenient set for $ 30 dollars and it was packed very nicely and lastly very fast shipping. This in my opinion makes this a must have item.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zip

customer_reviews.title: Plastic rack is not stable caution please...
customer_reviews.text: Weights are pretty good. But as I attached in my video the rack is not stable and rocks when I keep of take of the dumbbells. May be because of the plastic rack. I expected an steel or some solid rack to hold this 20 pound total weight. Plastic rack is the only issue. But for the price the weights are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lakshmanan

customer_reviews.title: These are dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty hard to rate dumbells! If I have trouble doing enough reps, should I take off one star? Anyway, I bought these because they are hexagonal and they'll stay where I put them. I also like the neoprene coating. It makes them comfortable to grasp and won't mar the wood floor--unless I drop one. The weight is clearly marked at each end, so I'll know I've got the right pair. I won't rate the color because you might think I'M the dumbbell.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hass

customer_reviews.title: High quality competitively priced set of weights
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set of weights - especially for the price! The neoprene is colorful. My hands are not overly large and the weights are easy to hold. I have not tested the actual weight for accuracy. I did wait about 3+ weeks for them to be delivered. Definitely worth the wait. Price is really fantastic for the quality! The only downside is that the stand is cheap plastic. However, at first blush it seems sturdy enough. If the stand was a little better it would have been 5 stars. But for the price it cannot be beat! I definitely highly recommend this set for the casual trainer.
customer_reviews.author: beterthanever

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for my arm workout
customer_reviews.text: I do an arm workout on youtube every day. I started with no weights, used water bottles for a month and then worked up to these. 2 lb. is what the instructor suggests. "Two pound weights, hard right? Is it not hard?" is what she says and she's not wrong. If you're a middle aged, out of shape woman like me I'd suggest starting with something like this. Don't be a hero! LOL They are exactly as described and a great deal. The local big box sports retailer wanted twice as much! I will likely order more in larger sizes once I work my way up.
customer_reviews.author: airedalemom

customer_reviews.title: Eats through wood finish!
customer_reviews.text: I have these weights in the 5, 3 and 1 pound versions. I decided to store them on my wood armoire below my TV for easy access. I haven't been able to work out in about a week and when I went to pick them up to use, they were stuck. They took the finish off my armoire and left a gooey mess on the weights. What kind of coating does that? I would not recommend buying this brand at all!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Rule

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted, solid, weights
customer_reviews.text: Got these two 20 pounders, and the box they came in sure was heavy! Each weight is individually boxed, then the two are put together in a bigger box. The soft covering gives a great grip, and as I also have the 10 pound set, I like that they are color coded and labelled. The handles are slightly convex shaped, and the curviness also helps to keep a steady grip. I don’t use them as often as I should, so I’m happy that they look good even as they gather dust sitting on my floor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Good starting weight
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was tempted to buy the 10 pound weights but after using these 5 pound weights I feel that I chose the right ones. There are a lot of simple exercises and stretches that can be enhanced by using 5 pound weights. Too much weight may result in fewer repetitions which shouldn't be the case when using 5 pound weights.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They're not RED • They're PINK and they're SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting a normal set of weights like you'd see in any gym, fitness place or yoga studio... but these are the smallest dumbells I have ever seen. I'm sure they are the requisite weight of 1 lb. but as far as using them for exercise --- hey far be it from me to be sexist -- but these are in now way the color red unless I suddenly turned color-blind. They are as pink as a baby's butt. I won't return them because I don't use 1 lb weights that often anyway, so buyer s-- just know what you're buyin'....
customer_reviews.author: Charles Laquidara

customer_reviews.title: Too large of a handle!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these weights because they were the only ones I could find during quarantine. I waited a month for them to come and I am disappointed to say they are very hard to use! The handle is too large/wide and very hard to grip. I have never seen weights with this wide of a handle. I would not recommend these to anyone unless you have huge hands.
customer_reviews.author: Allie M

customer_reviews.title: Coating is slightly sticky
customer_reviews.text: At least on the 1lb weights I bought, the coating feels slightly sticky/tacky compared to weights with similar coatings from other stores. It's definitely not bad enough to rub off and make my hands sticky, but it makes the weights a bit less pleasant to hold and makes me worry about how the coating will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Craig

customer_reviews.title: These 4lb Neoprene Dumbells are easy to use, great design, and add resistance to my workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the 4lb Neoprene Dumbbells by AmazonBasics. I received two pair and for a reasonable price! They make my workouts challenging. I am currently doing Brazilian Butt Lift workout, by Leandro Carvalho. When I do the sculpt workout I use the 4lb. dumbbells. It really has toned up my arms with the help of these dumbbells. I may get heavier weights some day. For now, I like what I have. They works my arms, the back of my arms, my legs, my rear end, and other areas of my body. It almost feels like I am running when I use the dumbbells. They are comfortable to use and have a good grip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for anyone to use
customer_reviews.text: I like these weights that are easy to hold and keep a grip on. I had to wait over a month for them to be delivered. The only reason I have it a 4 star is that one of the weights was broken where the metal inside wasn't attached on the end and I can feel it moving in the neoprene covering. It will eventually break but I would have to return both and wanted to have the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Jitzy

customer_reviews.title: For people with small hands!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quite difficult item to find especially for a decent price because these are weights so most 3rd party seller charge way more than Amazon brand I guess due to shipping. The reason for taking one star off is because of how small they are. You need to have small hands! I know they are only 1 lbs. each but since they are for my wife, suits her perfectly for her weekly online exercise class. I was cracking up when I opened the box initially because they look like toys!
customer_reviews.author: Dad75

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic dumbbell
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to find these since everywhere seems to have massively over-inflated prices for dumbbells right now. They are of good quality and meet the need well. However, compared to the other dumbbells we have, the handle part is more rounded, which is less comfortable. (Not enough to knock a star off the review score though.)
customer_reviews.author: Ghostie Cats

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Available!
customer_reviews.text: With everyone working out at home these days, it has been difficult finding free weight equipment locally. Although these were not available within the normal Prime 2 day window, they still arrived in less than a week and were exactly what I expected. The only drawback to this style of dumbbell (since it is cast in a mold) is the thickness of the grip area when the rubber coating is added. Other than that, the price is right and I only wish there were more sizes available at present. I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Chaubo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This dumbbell set is excellent. The set comes packed in plastic bags and cardboard. The storage rack is plastic. It held the full weight with no problems during the initial set up. The grips on the 2lb and 3lb weights measure 3 3/4” in diameter. The 5lb weights measure 4 1/2” in diameter. The rubber coating has no chemical odor. I checked all the weights on a digital postage scale. All the weights were within half an ounce of the claimed weight. I highly recommend this dumbbell set based on the quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Perfect complement to go with the Peloton
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I do a Peloton bike ride that uses weights. They may only be 3lbs, but as anyone who spins knows, small weights can begin to feel heavy when you're also riding. They fit nicely into the weight holders on the back of the bike (you shouldn't really be putting anything heavier than this back there anyway or it will bend the rack). I was grateful I was able to get a hold of these since free weights during the time of COVID have been very hard or very expensive to get.
customer_reviews.author: MMartins

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Weight
customer_reviews.text: just rec Gauge in new weight Jun 10 at 8:14 AM Raw messagePrintable view Mapuana Oxiles <moxiles@yahoo.com> To: Mapuana Oxiles <moxiles@yahoo.com> 2 Files102.5kBDownload All Preview JPG52kB IMG_0504.jpg Download Preview JPG50kB Mapuana Oxiles <moxiles@yahoo.com> To: Mapuana Oxiles <moxiles@yahoo.com> 2 Files102.5kBDownload All Preview JPG52kB IMG_0504.jpg Download Preview JPG50kB IMG_0503.jpg Download IMG_0503.jpg Download eived yesterday, however one of the weights has a hole in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Mapuana O

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 3lb 5lb 8lb set and I was in love with it. I was super happy when I ordered the 15lbs but it ridiculous how big they are ... it is super uncomfortable to grab and super big. I have pretty big hands and still, it is uncomfortable. I HATE them ... love the other ones but these are TOO big ... super disappointed. IT IS NOT SAFE TO GRAB. the handle is not easy to grip as stated in the description... due to the size of the handle, it could slip and NOT SAFE.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Best price for available weights.
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for weights for awhile since my gym closed because of Covid. But, apparently, so has everyone else. Finding weights for a reasonable price with reasonable delivery time was good luck for me. My local stores are out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great all round set of 7 lb dummbells, great grip
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are perfect for me in nursing an elbow back to health. When I didn't find a 7 lb weight set in the store, I turned to Amazon and this Basics set did not disappoint. My hands are rather small and these fit nicely so I feel like I have a sturdy grip. Love the neoprene coating much better than metal because there is less chance of slippage. The price seems right in line with what I'd pay even at big box retailers around the corner. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Total Girl Power
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of losing weight and need to add a strength building exercise to my routine. As a female, of course I ordered pink weights! Stand was a little awkward to put together but once I understood it, it was only a few minutes to assemble. Love the weights - I'm only at the 2lb level but they are perfect for me. Well made weights and I especially like the grip - kind of fuzzy and ridged so that you feel comfortable that you are not going to drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise Island Q

customer_reviews.title: Great set for lighter weights
customer_reviews.text: This little set is perfect for at-home workouts like online pilates classes. For Christmas I wanted to start getting items I needed to work-out at home, and who knew how timely that would turn out to be? It's been easy to stay consistent with my workouts during the pandemic. This little set is great for a lot of my low intensity arm exercises. The set easy to move around and stow away when I don't want it sitting out. The grip material is great even when I'm super sweaty. The tree stand is plastic but seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: ag1234

customer_reviews.title: Handful for the aged!
customer_reviews.text: Being shut-in due to Covid-19 and not being able to get to the Y several times a week, I needed ways to exercise. I found part of the answer for me to be these lighter weights. Hey, I'm an older citizen, use only the lesser weights, and these turned out to be what the doctor ordered! Well, almost. While my doctor didn't order them, he prescribed using such ways of keeping me in shape and heart disease under control. These weights are colorful and look comfortable around our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lynchburg Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hand weight set
customer_reviews.text: I'm a "senior" who let herself get out of shape. Bad me! So ... I am working out daily with videos I found online and using graduated weights to rebuild my strength. The stand is super easy to assemble - all you need is a screw driver - and the weights fit easily into the holders. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Arlis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. The stand is small and compact but it’s perfect for my space I’m glad it’s not bulky. It’s plastic and screws together kind of cheap but I think it’ll hold just fine. The weights themselves are nice. They feel good the grip is a little small my husband doesn’t like the fit but my hands are smaller and they’re perfect in my opinion. I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh F. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct weight, and are sticky
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my shipping scale and they are almost a pound different in weight. But the most annoying thing is that they are sticky. The finish is like its not cured, and not only does hair stick to them but they feel gross. I already don't want to work out and now I don't want to touch these without gloves. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Meggerz

customer_reviews.title: Easy grip and just right for getting back into shape
customer_reviews.text: I used to workout everyday until I got breast cancer. With the surgery, chemo and transfusions I felt like I had the wind knocked out of me. Those days are finally behind me and I decided to go with 10 pound weights because of the challenge - no wimpy lesser pounds for me. These are beyond perfect and I know that before long I will be back to my old self. By the way - I started out with 10 reps for each arm and I am up to 30 - yeah! Feeling like Rocky
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights; thick grip
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 15lb dumbbell pair. These are good basic weights. The neoprene coating and more ergonomic curved handle are nice touches and a step up from the old school cheap iron weights I'm used to. Be advised that the handles are quite thick and more of a handful than you'd think. These weights are ideal for medium to large hands, but people with small hands will find these very thick to hold onto. Depending on your preference, you might like that or you might not.
customer_reviews.author: rags

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it will do what I need for it to, however the packaging was terrible and the box looked like it had been through a war! Once I got everything out of the box, I noticed that pretty much each weight had nicks or missing spots of the outside covering. The stand is pretty cheap and once I put it together, it wobbled a little, but I am hoping that by having the weights on it will distribute it to sit the way that it should. I shouldn't complain considering they weren't that expensive, however I've come to expect better quality from Amazon Basics. Also, the packaging was unacceptable....
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Price

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These weights have a surface that comes off and damages your table or floor or whatever you put the weights down on. I placed these weights on my table so I would see them and remember to use them. When I picked them up I saw my table had sticky mucus-like areas. I can't clean this mess off my table. I do not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Came missing critical pieces of stand
customer_reviews.text: Stand came missing major pieces but not going to mail back 65 lbs of weights. Very poor quality control on something so simple. The stand is very lopsided now and half the weights rest on bare metal instead of plastic covers that only one side came with.
customer_reviews.author: Zedo

customer_reviews.title: I’m assuming that they are great if you get the right
customer_reviews.text: These were way too heavy for me, but because it was technically my fault for ordering the wrong weight, I had to pay to return it, which was half the price of the actual weights - even though I have Amazon Prime. I’m hesitant to buy another set. I’m assuming that they are great if you get the right weight
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is delightful. Perfect weight increments for a beginner home workout. The feel of the weights is a very nice texture. Easy to hold. The stand itself feels a little flimsy, but it does the job of nicely displaying the weights themselves. The packaging, however, was an utter nightmare. There was a smaller box inside an extremely large box, which made the 35lb package extremely difficult to carry up my three flights of stairs to my apartment. Once getting it upstairs, there was so much tape to cut through. After nearly 30 minutes struggling to open the heavy package, I finally got it open to find even more small boxes inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Paige

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I needed these weights for physical therapy. The price of free weights is inflated. My first set of weights was lost. I did not want a refund I wanted the weights. Customer service and link said unavailable. I escalated the call to leadership. They have special privileges. She was able to order an item that was out of stock and not on back order. A refund is not always the best answer. You can’t beat the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chipii

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality weight set at the best price I could find.
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, this is an excellent basic hand weight set. The set is also priced lower than any other, similar, set that I found online after an extensive search. I am very happy with the weights. I have been using them for several weeks now, and they are as good as any other set I have ever used. A very good choice!
customer_reviews.author: medtronic1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value weights / stand is unstable
customer_reviews.text: This set of amazonbasics dumbbells is an excellent value for the money. They are easy to hold. The weight combination (3lbs, 5lbs, 8lbs) is good variety for different exercises. The only negative is the stand. It isn't stable, at least not on my carpet in my bedroom where I use these. It is especially unstable if you are using the 8lb weights, and only the 5 and 3 pound weights are on the stand. It becomes top heavy with the 8 pound weights off the stand, and highly likely to fall. My solution is to not use the stand and I simply have these on the floor in the corner of room.
customer_reviews.author: vac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of weights
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to receive these during coronavirus. They're perfect- no weird plastic smells or damage. They've been on my carpeted gym floor up against the baseboard and haven't left a mark, so whatever caused other reviewers' weights to eat through table finishes seems to be resolved. I hope they're back in stock for other shoppers soon!
customer_reviews.author: YogaMom

customer_reviews.title: Not great for holding, don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time holding these weights. They are also an odd length. It’s difficult to rack them on my shoulders for squats etc but it’s also awkward in my hands. I don’t recommend them, I have other neoprene ones I like far more. I am a small woman so perhaps they would work better if you had larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: You don't want a garbage weight when you're working out. One that can fall off or move. I have several of these weights in different weight sizes. They do the job. I like the color coding too. If I'm not paying attention and grab one, I know what size because I know the color for each. Plus, they're pretty displayed and when you're working with something that is pretty, it helps....every little bit helps. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend so she could exercise during the Covid-19 quarantine. Looks like everyone is doing the same cause it kept selling out. I took a chance and one day it popped up so I snatched it quick. Nice little set with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Nice, coated and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.text: All about the weights is very good. They are well-balanced and soft to the touch, comfortable and correctly weighted. Only drawback is the stand, made of slightly too thin plastic that could use a little more strength and a cross-piece at the top for carrying the whole set of weights from place to place. Maybe a liner of sheetmetal, held in place by the five cross-pieces and a new one-inch top piece of pipe for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: What a great little set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely worth the money and 10 minute time investment to assemble the stand. I would have preferred a heavier set, maybe 3,5 & 7 pounds but nothing was available in those sizes. This is a great set for Seniors who want to regain some of the arm strength they've lost or perhaps for a early teen to build-up their arms. If you want to be the next Arnold Schwarzenegger, I suggest you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of lightweight dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: The weights are cute and easy to use. Worth the price. I love the colors. I was attracted to them initially because they did have the stand but unfortunately the stand is my only complaint. It’s kind of a pain in the butt to assemble and super flimsy, not really even worth putting together. But if you’re looking for a nice set of lightweight dumbbells these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: FitnessFoxKC

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to grip
customer_reviews.text: They are so thick I cannot even grip them. I cannot return them due to wright/cost. Waste of money. Have to have ridiculously huge hands to use them.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality cheap alternative for medium weights
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying these weights because I saw other reviews about them falling apart, but I’ve had them for a couple months now and they’re still in great condition. I use them quite frequently for Peloton strength classes and they’ve come in handy as a cheap alternative to free weights at the gym during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, for people (or perhaps presidents) with very small hands
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny. I bought them for shadowboxing, but they're too small to consider them comfortable. But, I had to wait like 2 months to get dumbbells from Amazon, so I guess I'll take what I can get. The listing also said "red" but these are totally pink.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanJeff

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbells sold at normal prices? HU-FREAKING-ZZAH!
customer_reviews.text: Review for both 8 lb pair and 15 lb pair: First off, I want to thank AmazonBasics for not price gouging during the pandemic. My research has led me to dumbbells being fairly valued between $1.00 to $1.50 / lb. These came in on the low end of fair value range so I was more than happy to buy. These are being used at least once a week and they are great. I did not find any sort of damage, unpleasant smells, defects, etc. Just open it up, quick inspection, and lock and load. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weights. Be careful, though. Our German Shepherd thought they were training dumbells for him. He has no trouble carrying the 5 lb weight. He also didn't think the purple color was quite his style and removed some of the rubber. He still doesn't understand why he can't use them but he leaves them in their basket. He does whine when I use them so I think he'd really like a second set with more manly colors. The stand is ok but kind of a pain so I just have them in a wicker basket. I like to use them when watching TV so I don't want to fuss with putting them back on their stand.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl w

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid barbells
customer_reviews.text: Love my cool and colorful barbells...an incentive for working out! And with all the tutorials online, you really couldn't go wrong with these beauties. As for set up? I didn't have to do a single thing...except for pull the stand from its box. They are also helpful for bracing yourself when doing planks if you aren't limber enough...they give you a couple inches of lift. Thanks to my hubby for the gift. Ü. Eddy
customer_reviews.author: TrueHero

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful economical price
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a basic hand weight set to get started with weight training. This set is great for the price. I love the colors. My only issue, and I am nit picking here, is the stand seems very flimsy. Not sure it will hold up with time. Also when the weights are on the stand they are hard to pick up because they are so close together. But if you don't have a lot of money this is a great set to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Paal

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: The set is absolutely beautiful! The bells are vibrant colors that inspire me even more on my workouts plus they are very easy to keep your grip. Great for a nice workout at your home. The set was easy peasy to assemble. Also it was a great value for so many weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight set for home gym
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these not knowing what to expect and questioning if the coating would be something that was done well. I was pleasantly surprised and am happy with the quality. Six and seven pound dumbbells are not available in the local stores where I live, and I wanted the lighter in-between weights for when a couple extra pounds make a big difference for super small muscle groups.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute!! I saw them at my PT center and bought them to help with the tendinitis in my wrists. They are super lightweight, obviously, so I sit watching movies while doing reps. They are definitely helping.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa 'Dog/Wolf Lover'Top Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great hand weights!!! They are durable and have a great grip to them! The weight holder it comes with is compact and fits perfectly in any small corner of a room. WARNING! The whole set comes in ONE box without handles, and requires probably two people to lift safely unless you have a hand cart (or a very muscular man/woman lol). The person who delivered it to me couldn’t even make it to the actual porch by my door and set it half way up my stairway to my porch landing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Stand is garbage
customer_reviews.text: the cheap plastic stand is difficult to assemble because the plastic screws do not thread well. The whole thing is also very flimsy and probably won't last long. The weights are great. The coating is consistent and gives a good grip when your hands are sweaty. Easy to clean with a quick soap and water wash. Prefect starter set and for extended shoulder work with lots of reps.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitfud

customer_reviews.title: almoat a 23 star rating
customer_reviews.text: the each weigh 5 lbs when i lift them, they appear to be affected by gravity in such a way that is consistent with both the advertising and my needs will buy again, if these somehow like blink from existence will give a 23 star rating if the company figures out a way to manipulate artificial mass in a way that makes it so my little weights can be either 5 or 5000 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Catzmotron

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: the product is good but the cover is slightly unfinished or bit loose. Overall great just would have liked it if the finish of the product was perfect. I feel at some point the skin or cover of the weights may tear off. But I think for the price it is good and no other issues at all. I would recommend it. And good to have something in stock at this point in time and delivery was perfect by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weights are great but the stand is unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great. Our kids love to workout with us and thought this would be perfect for them. However, the stand is junk. In my opinion the stand is not safe at all for its intended purpose. Our dog could easily bump into this and it would fall over. If you have babies that are crawlers or just learning to walk this would be dangerous around them. I guess even for cats and curious small dogs it would be dangerous around them as well. We will be buying a different stand for the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic stand came broken, dumbbells will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Okay so first off- I bought weights and got weights. Have not used them yet for a workout but I have no doubt they will do what I need them to do. I love the fun colors! Love the stand, easy to switch between weights with the stand. Great. Don’t love that the stand came broken. Three of the four ‘feet’ of the plastic arrived busted. Really think the packaging was not sufficient for this or maybe a cheaper quality plastic used.
customer_reviews.author: Emily55&5522

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have huge hands, you may not want these!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use these but the grips are so ridiculously large that I can't even hold them long enough to complete my reps, it's just too difficult to grip! I have pretty large hands for a woman, so I wouldn't recommend them to any women! And my husband thought they felt pretty uncomfortable to hold, he has average hands for a guy. So, they are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Neoprene Workout Dumbbell Hand Weights, 32 Pounds Total, Purple/Green/Yellow - 3 Pairs (3-Lb, 5-Lb, 8-Lb) & Weight Rack
feature_bullets: Set of six cast iron dumbbells in three weight categories with storage stand - 3 Pairs: 32 Pounds Total (3-Lb, 5-Lb, 8-Lb)
Neoprene-coated for durability, safety, and a non-slip grip
Printed weight number on each end cap and color-coded for quick identification
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Pre-assembled, foldable steel stand in a tiered triangular shape
Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routines

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
